review: I live in australia so maybe its just me but i cannot even connect to a server without being kicked or the game crashing,The one time i was able to join a game I just didnt really enjoy myself, i kept dying over and over by people that were teleporting around and just seemed to come from nowhereSo as i said its probably on my end but im still giving this a bad rating beacuse of this.
